name: EP Carrillo - Honduras - Gordo
additionalNotes: E.P. Carrillo is the signature brand of EPC Cigar Co., the Dominican cigar company owned and operated by Ernesto Perez-Carrillo. Known as the “Godfather of Boutique Cigars,” Perez-Carrillo’s brand received early acclaim with its Elencos Edición Limitada and Short Run cigars, and has continued to impress with brand extensions like E.P. Carrillo La Historia and E.P. Carrillo Selección Oscuro. E.P. Carrillo cigars are made at Perez-Carrillo’s Tabacalera La Alianza S.A. factory in the Dominican Republic.
